title: Ticket #3062: Nordugrid ARC job ids changed
description:
In the latest version of NorduGrid ARC (12.05), the format for job ids has changed. Before the ids were purely numeric. Now, they are alphanumeric. The nordugrid_gahp parses the job ids. That code needs to be updated.

david.cameron@cern.ch has provided a patch.
remarks:
2012-Jul-10 10:25:40 by jfrey:
Symptom: nordugrid_gahp will say that submission to ARC failed with error message "Failed to parse job id". Condor will put the job on hold with a HoldReason that includes this message.

2012-Jul-20 11:43:00 by jfrey:
Jeff Dost tested this patch with glideinWMS and reports that it fixes the problems they saw.
2012-Aug-23 14:10:57 by zmiller:
Bulk change of target version from v070802 to v070803 using ./ticket-target-mover.
attachments:
• nordugrid-jobid.patch 554 bytes added by jfrey on 2012-Jun-14 21:05:27 UTC.
    Patch for nordugrid_gahp's parsing of job ids, provided by david.cameron@cern.ch
check_ins: 2012-Jun-20 13:39   Check-in [32438]: Accept new NorduGrid ARC job ids in the nordugrid_gahp. #3062 In the latest version of NorduGrid ARC (12.05), job ids can contain letters as well as digits. Update the gahp's scanning of job ids to match. ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
